inputs.remark:
V1 缺少Tympanometry、Acoustic Reflex、SRT
V2 缺少RESR90和fitting细节

logic_summary: Added Tympanometry, Acoustic Reflex, and Speech Audiometry (noting SRT not done) to V1 tests based on Figure 38.1 and text.
Updated V2 history to include fitting details (70% target, programs).
Updated V2 REM test findings to include RESR90 measurement.

numeric_results.Right Ear: Volume: 1.5 mL, Admittance: 1.2 mmho, Pressure: -20 daPa
numeric_results.Left Ear: Volume: 1.1 mL, Admittance: 1.4 mmho, Pressure: -20 daPa

value.name: Acoustic Reflex Thresholds
value.key_findings: Ipsilateral reflexes present at 500, 1000, and 2000 Hz; absent at 4000 Hz. Contralateral reflexes could not be tested.

value.name: Speech Audiometry
value.key_findings: SRT and WRS were not completed at this visit.

patch_ops.value: Hearing aid fitting and verification. Programmed to NAL-NL1 targets but gain reduced to 70% for acclimatization. A second speech-in-noise program with adaptive directionality was added.

Slim-tube BTE with power domes failed to meet NAL-NL1 targets. Switched to Receiver-In-Canal (RIC) with power domes, which met targets for 50, 65, and 80 dB SPL inputs. RESR90 measured to ensure output accommodated reduced dynamic range.
